cause.description:
This foundation is kind of like a huge session. Everyone who doesnt have chronic, dont worry the bowl is packed and headed your way. Those who need a little tender loving buzz will find it within this propoganda of great ideas and stoners will find it a relief to know theres help right here on facebook.
1. Marijuana is not a drug
2. THC is calming and carefree
3. BC growers need stoners to stay alive
cause.mission: Get those high who have no thc
cause.name: Done Doobs Foundation
